channel.title: Plzzzzz help!

item.title: Plzzzzz help!
item.dc:creator: @eggmaster987 eggmaster987
item.description:
@eggmaster987 wrote:

TWO TUTORIALS
HOW TO PLACE OBJECTS
HOW TO MAKE OBJECTS TELEPORT YOU OR GIVE YOU ITEMS

plz dont request but heres how
not a copy and paste

[size=20pt]HOW TO PLACE OBJECTS[/size]

open client.java and search

    public void NewObjects() {

it should look like this

makeGlobalObject(2445, 3097, 4156, 0, 10);//portal makeGlobalObject(2510, 3863, 2783, -3, 10);// Anvil makeGlobalObject(2843, 2964, 61, -3, 10); // Ancient Alter makeGlobalObject(3042, 4843, 2781, 0, 10);// Furnace makeGlobalObject(2378, 3438, 2287, -1, 10);// Obstacle Pipe makeGlobalObject(2380, 3440, 2193, 0, 10);// Chest makeGlobalObject(2383, 3427, 3816, 1, 10);// Kitchen Drawers makeGlobalObject(2572, 3853, 9398, -2, 10); // shopportal makeGlobalObject(3093, 3505, 7324, 0, 10); // blue portal makeGlobalObject(2381, 3438, 4172, -1, 10); // Range makeGlobalObject(2854, 3957, 61, 2, 10); // Ancient Alter makeGlobalObject(2852, 2953, 4389, 0, 10); // shopportal makeGlobalObject(3092, 3505, 2466, -2, 10);// red portal makeGlobalObject(2868, 9883, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2868, 9882, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2868, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2859, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2859, 9882, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2864, 9881, 2932, 0, 10); //thing makeGlobalObject(2863, 9881, 2932, 0, 10); //thing makeGlobalObject(2511, 3864, 4172, 0, 10); // Range makeGlobalObject(2895, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2895, 3509, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2892, 9907, 4626, 0, 10); // Stairs makeGlobalObject(2465, 4817, 4126, 0, 10); // silver chest

now add this too the bottom of list

        makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, aaaa, m, 10); // DESCRIPTION HERE

xxxx = x coords of were you want object
yyyy = y coords of were you want object
aaaa = object id
m= object rotation type here -1 -2 -3 -4
10 = IGNORE THIS NEVER ADJUST IT

[size=20pt]HOW TO MAKE OBJECTS TELEPORT YOU OR GIVE YOU ITEMS/XP[/size]

find the id of the object you want to make and the coords may be needed

now open client.java and search case 1
a few times
it should look something like this

case 11354: if (objectX == 2521 && objectY == 4775) { sendMessage("You go to the selling zone"); teleportToX = 3094; teleportToY = 3495; } break;

may look very different

heres the explenation

      case 11354:

is the item id

            if (objectX == 2521 && objectY == 4775) {[/code]
is the coords of were the object is
[code]                sendMessage("You go to the selling zone");[/code]
this is the message that will be send to them
[code]                teleportToX = 3094;
                teleportToY = 3495;
[/code] coords it will send them to
 [code]           }
            break;
[/code] the end of the case 

it should look like this

 [code]      case 4499:
            if (objectX == 2797 && objectY == 3614) {
                sendMessage("You crawl through the cave");
                teleportToX = 2772;
                teleportToY = 10231;
            }
            break;

        case 8987:
            if (objectX == 2523 && objectY == 4777) {
                sendMessage("You go back home");
                teleportToX = 3213;
                teleportToY = 3433;
            }
            break;

        case 11354:
            if (objectX == 2521 && objectY == 4775) {
                sendMessage("You go to the selling zone");
                teleportToX = 3094;
                teleportToY = 3495;
            }
            break;

        case 881:
            if (objectX == 3208 && objectY == 3460) {
                sendMessage("You go to altars");
                teleportToX = 2527;
                teleportToY = 4778;
            }
            break;

now how to make it give you items

add this now

[code] case 10687: // case at home

	addItem(6822,1);
	addItem(6828,1);
	addItem(6834,1);
	addItem(6840,1);
	addItem(6846,1);
	addItem(6852,1);
	addItem(6853,1);
        sendMessage("HAPPY CHRISTMAS IF IT IS CHRISTMAS. LOL!!!");

            break;

[/code]
change the case to the object id
change all the item ids to what you want it to give you
and the message to what you want it to say

now for xp

add this

[code] case 104:
if (GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You gain some slayer Exp”);
actionTimer = 10;
setAnimation(423);
addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[18]), 18);
stillgfx(199, absY, absX);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

[/code]
chane the case to what your object id is
change the send message
and change the add skill xp to what you want
you can change the anim ation and the still gfx for a great emote
thanks for reading

give me rep and this is my first tutorial

[size=30pt]GIVE ME REP[/size]

[size=30pt]JOIN MY SERVER IP IS MUSHROOMPK.NO-IP.BIZ[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Plzzzzz help!
item.dc:creator: @ischooltenny ischooltenny
item.description:
@ischooltenny wrote:

Making an NPC talk is quite simple. Firstly, open up NPCHandler.

The structure of the code looks something like this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == XXXX) //NPC id
{
   if (misc.random2(30) <= 5) //Randomizes when the NPC speaks
  {
      npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
      npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
      npcs[i].textUpdate = "Whatever you want it to say";
  }
}

If you scroll down, you will probably many blocks of code like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Plzzzzz help!
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Answer to question three:

To place an NPC first, open your autospawn.cfg. Next, add the NPC using this as a guide:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

So for example if I wanted Paladin at the coordinates X 3500, Y 3500 I would add it to autospawn like this:

spawn = 21      3500     3500     0     0     0     0     0     1

That simply means that the NPC 21 will be at X 3500, Y 3500 at the normal height (0) and will not move.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2008, 11:32:58 am[/size][hr]To add a new object open the client.java and search for:

public void NewObjects() {

Under that add something like this:

                    makeGlobalObject(X coord, Y coord, Object ID, Height, 10);

Hope that helps .

Read full topic

item.title: Plzzzzz help!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ok, I am a noob at this, and I need help.

  1. Adding an object. The code and where in client.jav to put it(use a bank code as the example 2213)

  2. Making a NPC speak outloud. I have this code:
    else if (NPCID == 0) { /Welcome Hans/
    skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
    skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
    NpcWanneTalk = 1339;
    what is the skill(X/Y) and wanne talk 1339? How do I change what he says outloud? Where would i put this code?

  3. Adding an NPC (same as Q1, the code and where to put it.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2008, 09:29:10 am[/size][hr]Ya… plz
